resources.string: Enable peak luminance based on sunlight
Time delay before HBM turns off
High Brightness Mode (HBM) boosts the display\'s peak luminance, making it easier to see in direct sunlight. Using this for extended periods can increase heat and may accelerate display degradation.
This feature allows you to set thermal profiles for individual apps, helping manage performance and temperature. "Default" profile is applied to all apps not specified in other categories.
Reduces screen flickering at low brightness

This feature adjusts screen brightness by changing the display\'s DC voltage instead of using fast flickering (PWM). This can reduce eye strain in low light, but may cause slight color shifting on some panels.
DC Dimming is not supported by your kernel
Warning: Bypass charging may cause increased device temperature or battery damage. Use with caution.
Bypass charging is not supported on this device
When enabled, the phone draws power directly from the charger to run the system, bypassing the battery. This reduces heat during heavy tasks (like gaming) but should be used with caution.
Modified apps with ad-blocking and background playback

ReVanced adds helpful features like ad-blocking, background playback, and more. Includes the latest built-in ReVanced YouTube and YouTube Music. No MicroG is required. Auto-updates are disabled for both apps, and you should not update them from the Play Store. A device reboot is only required if you manually toggle the feature on or off.
